## [eeguana](https://bruno.nicenboim.me/eeguana/) <a href="http://bruno.nicenboim.me/eeguana/"><img src="http://bruno.nicenboim.me/eeguana/reference/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="139" /></a>

An R package for tidy-ish manipulation of EEG data. It is fully functional, but it's only able to do basic preprocessing. 


## [pangoling](https://bruno.nicenboim.me/pangoling/) <a href="http://bruno.nicenboim.me/pangoling/"><img src="http://bruno.nicenboim.me/pangoling/reference/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="139" /></a>

An R package for estimating the log-probabilities of words in a given context using transformer models. The package provides an interface for utilizing pre-trained transformer models (such as GPT-2 or BERT) to obtain word probabilities. These log-probabilities are often utilized as predictors in psycholinguistic studies.
